name: Strange
description:
Our character finds himself in the midst of mysterious events when his new friend Molly, whom he has just met at a night play, disappears.

To reach Molly, he must collect various clues and find the treasure in the forest that Will mentioned. But there is something else waiting for him in the forest.

In this exploration and puzzle game, you will collect various clues, research in the library and try to solve a mystery with the information you have gathered.

In this game set in a cute town, earn money by selling the apples you collect from the apple orchard to the market. go after a treasure for more money.



Create a formula needed to open the portal and enter a fantastic universe.

Research and learn how the formula is made and collect the necessary elements to open the portal.

Scare your friends in a halloween event.

Strange is a game with realistic graphics in an atmospheric environment. It tells a mysterious story based on a mission system in which we do various mischief through the eyes of a child, and you can spend an enjoyable 5 hours.
